wwutil.model.annotation
Annotation Type VersionLocking

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface VersionLocking

Mark an int field in a model class for optimistic locking using version. Optimistic locking works as follow: 

  - When an object is put, its @VersionLocking field is incremented by 1 automatically.
  - The put turns into a conditional putIf with the value of the @VersionLocking field.
  - If the version number is not 1+ of the existing one, put is aborted since the object is outdated.
  - Caller should re-get the object and retry putting.
If caller calls putIf with other expected value, the version number is not checked but it is still incremented by 1 automatically. Note: VersionLocking has no effect when calling Dao.batchPut().
